skills.name: Battle Charge
skills.description: Charges towards the enemy to inflict damage and provokes for 1 turn with a 50% chance.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%

skill_effect.name: Provoke
skill_effect.description: The monster is forced to only attack the monster which applied the effect

skills.name: Battle Stomp
skills.description: Stomps on all enemies and decreases the Attack Bar by 25% for each target with a 50% chance. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>ATK</mark> + 0.12*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Heavy Impact
skills.description: Inflicts great damage by crashing into the enemy. The damage is proportionate to my MAX HP and the enemy's MAX HP.
skills.multiplier_formula: 0.35*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark> + 0.15*<mark>Target MAX HP</mark>
